name: Get Off, Cat!
description:
You are working on your Ludum Dare game diligently, and suddenly a cat is on your computer.

Figure out how to get the cat off your computer.

This is the official Android port! For the free Win/Mac/Linux Ludum Dare version of the game, please visit: http://missingsentinelsoftware.com/game/get-cat

This game was made by @josefnpat for the December 2015 OneGameAMonth challenge and Ludum Dare 34.
